Package SnakeGame

Class GameplayOverlay

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
SnakeGame.GameplayOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOverlay
public class GameplayOverlay extends GameObject implements IOverlay
The overlay displayed while the game is being played

    • GameplayOverlay

      public GameplayOverlay(ISnakeStats snakeStats, Rectangle camera, TextOverlayOutline outline, int unitSize)
      Initializes a GameplayOverlay
      Parameters:
      snakeStats - the handle to get the snake's info
      camera - the camera to draw the overlay in
      outline - the outline of the overlay

    • GameplayOverlay

      public GameplayOverlay(ISnakeStats snakeStats, Rectangle camera, char cornerTL, char cornerTR, char cornerDL, char cornerDR, char sideLR, char sideTD, int unitSize)
      Initializes a GameplayOverlay
      Parameters:
      snakeStats - the handle to get the snake's info
      camera - the camera to draw the overlay in
      cornerTL - the top left corner character
      cornerTR - the top right corner character
      cornerDL - the bottom left corner character
      cornerDR - the bottom right corner character
      sideLR - the left and right sides character
      sideTD - the top and bottom character
